group_1.narration: If academic and athletic ability can be@called "talents", one might also say that@natural beauty is a talent, as well.

group_1.textRight: Oh, she's here! It's Ria Ami!!!
Oh my goooshhh! Riaaaaaa!

group_1.narration: This is Ria Ami. Though still a student,@she is the center of media attention and@regarded as a goddess of stunning beauty.
Despite her striking good looks however,@her taste in food is remarkably simple.
Ria, we heard that you love Japanese food.

group_1.textCenter: I know my modest tastes surprise many@people.
But honestly, I find myself eating Japanese@food often to keep my hair and skin healthy.

group_1.narration: And you also like snow peas, is that right?

group_1.textCenter: Hm, I suppose so. Now that you mention it...
They do tend to be in many of the dishes my@mother makes.
She sometimes asks me to help prepare them.

group_1.narration: You know, it's easiest to shell them by@pulling from the end opposite the stem!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, really?! I usually open them from the@the stem...

group_1.textRight: You were mumbling and talking to yourself@again.
I was just trying to pull you back into the@real world.
Anyway, there's a Witch that needs roasting!@Come give me a hand, okay?

group_1.textLeft: You're not making a bit of sense.
Care to try again with some details this time?

group_1.textRight: It happened just yesterday!
A Witch showed up right by the restaurant.
But get this, my Soul Gem didn't react to@it at all!

group_1.textLeft: Maybe you just didn't notice it?

group_1.textRight: Um, hello? It's me we're talking about!
Hey, you're the last person I want to@ridicule me for that.
I can't let that Witch keep wreaking havoc@near the restaurant!
I'm just asking if you'd help me patrol the@area!

group_1.textLeft: Why should I be expected to help...

group_1.textRight: Do you not want to? If you don't, you@won't be able to enjoy our secret menu.
An extra large order of our delicious rice@omelet.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, even the renowned chef of Walnut's@would resort to bribing customers, hm?

group_1.textRight: Hey, it's not bribery at all!
I just know you're never able to turn down@someone in need!
After all, I'm asking for help from THE@Ria Ami, beautiful both inside and out.
So you'll help me, won't you?

group_1.textLeft: Uuurgh, my heart is aching! You know@exactly how to exploit someone's weakness!
So when is this patrol thing? Today?

group_1.textRight: You'll help?! Oooh, I knew an elegant beauty@like you wouldn't let me down!

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, it's rough having such a conniving@friend.

group_1.textRight: It's rougher to have such a narcissist for a@friend!
